column3: Sport;The Philippines:  Cambodian taekwondo heroine ------Sorn Seavmey------
column4: has won a gold medal at the 30th SEA Games in the Philippines.------The 24 year old Cambodian defeated  Filipino Alora Kirstie Elaine in the taekwondo women’s over-73kg event.------This is the third gold medal earned by Cambodia at the ongoing SEA Games in the Philippines. The first two gold medals were won in the arnis and ------petanque------ events.------Cambodia has so far won  30 medals – three gold
column5: six silver and twenty-one bronze – in Arnis
column7: Taekwondo and boxing.------Cambodia will host the 32nd SEA Games in 2023.
